Nick demonstrates cautiousness but is tactically opportunistic, capable of adapting quickly when unexpected moves arise. Nick's strategy seems to hinge on identifying and exploiting these instances without overexposure of his own intentions. To counter him in the next round, I should maintain a balanced approach—observant yet unpredictable myself while being ready for aggressive challenges when he least expects them, especially if there's an element of surprise or miscalculation on my part that could prompt such opportunism from Nick.
